captions.text:
I was taking my pet dog for a walk when all of a sudden I noticed 
that a stray cat was following me

This was my first meeting with the cat, 
and this was when we became family

At first I thought the cat liked me, but actually it seems 
that the one he really loves is my dog
Thank you to the cat who visited my home and made my day so special!

title: 犬が好きな野良猫が家族になりましたよ(押しかけ猫）My new family member, the cat who likes dogs
